description: Collection of parameters for an easy Sitecore installation and un-installation.
warning: NEVER USE THIS WAY OF INSTALLING FOR PRODUCTION ENVIRONMENTS.
tip: the (un)installation process creates logfiles. Keep this logfiles in a safe place because it contains passwords for databases and certificates
